title: Download problem

embed.description: install anythign is throgh the original setup. Where can I get a League of Legends Full Setup? or ... http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer ...

body: When i try Download Lol OCE for Mac i am re directed to this link, any solutions? i just wanna LoL :'(

replies.body:
No way.

No way that's legit. You would not be sent there from this website.

Make sure you're going to [this page](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).
He's right, I have the same problem. I clicked your link and the same thing happened :'(

I'm on Windows, and the download is working fine for me.

Not 100% sure on how Mac handles downloads. There may be an issue with a recent change to the website which is causing this. I suggest waiting it out a bit, at least until the connection problems that people are currently experiencing has been fixed.
Can confirm that this is an issue - I had to reinstall the game and now cannot download the .dmg file from the LoL website. Please fix, this is really not good enough.
